text: [Music]
creativity really uh for a pastor comes
in two ways first uh there's something
that works universally with everybody
whether you're a Believer or not and
that is you study study study intensely
on a subject and then um after you've
thought on it you set it aside and you
go to something totally relaxing and it
is in that relaxing period that your
subconscious goes to work and will often
organize what you need to do and so
sometimes you get the brightest ideas in
the shower or driving or sitting in the
backyard it's very hard to prepare a
message if you don't build in the
pauses any any speech any message will
be more effective and be more creative
if you allow time to intensely study it
and then take a break intensely study it
and take a break as a pastor I have uh
also God's spirit which gives me ideas
uh when we we say that when God gives
you an idea that's called inspiration
when the devil gives you an idea that's
called Temptation and when you give
yourself an idea that's just called an
idea and all the time you're getting all
three you know it's like do I do the
good do I do the bad or whatever and
there are many times well I've been
studying a particular text of scripture
and I'll say God what does this thing
mean I don't really understand it
doesn't make sense' how what does it
mean and I will ask a question I'll say
dear Lord help me to know what this
means and give me the ideas even as I
asleep you rearrange my subconscious and
often times I'll ask a question as I go
to sleep and when I wake up the next
morning it's just there and the outline
comes very very quickly
